item.description: We'll do a little strolling, a little hiking....mostly looking at trees, practicing our winter i.d. skills (skilled suburban naturalists need to know their deciduous plants with or without leaves, since leaves are absent nearly half the time each year). But we'll also scan the skies for birds, turn over a few logs and rocks, maybe even a little tracking.
item.how_to_find_us: arnold arboretum: meet at parking area/entrance gate on corner of walter and bussey streets.
item.name: suburban naturalists Meetup
